reviewText:
I don't know what a the cable version is ? but sounds like you should not buy it from this site, go to the site I got the DVD from Movietyme. Coming Home is a powerful and memorising story about War in Iraq and the meaning of love, the power of forgiveness and the devistation of simple mistakes we make in life, it perfectly tells a very impressive story that will grip you til the very last minute of the film. Brad Armstron amazingly directs this fantastic and unforgettable achievement that'll change the wya people have their opinions on porn forever ... When all of you people who are against porn say that porn is unadulterated rubbish with no meaning of life and ruins the way people think, well you lot need to buy Coming Home and I'll garuntee you'll have very different opinions after seeing this film. I mean it when I say that this movie is bloody beautiful and powerdfully made with some highly talented acting from Brad Armstrong and his fellow porn actos in his movie, they have all proven that just because a movie is a porn movie don't mean the actos have no talent and the director are rubbish at directing, Coming Home is an achievement to the industry of adult filmmaking, the industry need to remeber that Brad Armstrong while he still making this beautiful movies people might think that porn can be just as talented and deserving as some of the very best normal non porn movies like the green mile and shawshank redemption.

this movie has a very important and inspiring message and a very thrilling and heartbreaking twist, this is one porn movie that'll leave you thinking awww bless, with a box of tissues at the ready to wipe away the tears.

Not just one of the best porn movies ever its also one of the best overall movies I've ever seen.
I returned the DVD because it was evidently the "edited for cable" version and I wanted the full version.  I will reorder but try to confirm it is the right version.

I purchased this item twice now from different sellers, but each time I received the cable version, even though the second person I purchased from had the description that said the item was unrated, when I received it it was the cable version, I honestly don't know how to get the unrated version now, but I know I'm not going to find it on amazon

this film was film in my town morris ill .it was film at the school i went too.it only 65 min long .it a billy gram film .a boyn get in trouble .and they moved hime from chicago .there a homecoming dance in the movie .the dance was in my high school gym ..our school real name for our football team it called morris redskins and the movie name for morris was called the gesries .i recomend it.i do own it on  vhs i want to get it on dvd icheck christanbooks store and cant find it iand other school are invold.when the movie starts you will see cow on morris entrance .it a cleanmovie and family rated no bad langue at all.please what it there is a short billy gram crusade
